con:elements.con:expectedValue: All enrolled members with an active profile status
Earn points for each dollar spent at a property

{ "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "StartDate": "{{STARTDATE}}", "EndDate": "{{ENDDATE}}", "Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "MomentStatus": "A", "MomentResponseValues": [ { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "BASE INDICATOR", "ResponsePropertyValue": "N", "Status": "P" }, { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "ENGAGE INDICATOR", "ResponsePropertyValue": "Y", "Status": "P" }, { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "POINT SUBTYPE", "ResponsePropertyValue": "{{DEFAULTPOINTSUBTYPEID}}", "Status": "P" }, { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "POINT TYPE", "ResponsePropertyValue": "{{DEFAULTPOINTTYPEID}}", "Status": "P" } ],"MomentEvent": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "MomentQualifyingDateAttribute": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDateTime", "MomentOffers": [ { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}", "MomentOutcome": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "OutcomeEquationUi": "round({{POINTS_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}*PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible)", "CalculationTemplate": "round(<VariableFactor,[Number]>*<TransactionEligible,[Number]>)", "OutcomeEquationTemplate": "%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22func%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Math.round%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22(%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22obj%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22VariableFactor%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22Number%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22var%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22variable_0%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22{{POINTS_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22*%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22obj%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22TransactionEligible%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22Number%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22var%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22variable_1%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%24PurchaseTxn.getTransactionEligible()%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22)%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22obj%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22drools%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22String.valueOf(new%20Double(Math.round({{POINTS_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}*%24PurchaseTxn.getTransactionEligible())))%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D", "FormulaName": "ROUND_ELIGIBLE", "Status": "A" },"MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue >= 0 && PurchaseTxn.{{OPTIONALLOCATION}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.{{OPTIONALPRODUCT}} && PurchaseTxn.Nights >= {{MINIMUM_NIGHTS}}", "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}] }, "Status": "A" } ] }, "Status": "A", "BestOfferIndicator": false, "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(eligible_revenue) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans) /{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(eligible_revenue) /{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans) /{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM T_ACT_TRANSACTION INNER JOIN T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL ON T_ACT_TRANSACTION.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID INNER JOIN V_TRANSACTION ON V_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ID = T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ID {{PRODUCTSUBQUERY}} {{LOCATIONSUBQUERY}} WHERE T_ACT_TRANSACTION.PROGRAM_CODE = :ProgramCode AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.STATUS IN('A','P') AND(T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('PR', 'EP') OR(T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('RT', 'ER', 'EX') AND ACT_TRANSACTION_XREF_ID IS NULL)) AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND V_TRANSACTION.NIGHTS >={{MINIMUM_NIGHTS}} AND {{PRODUCT_HIERARCHY}} AND (SELECT PARAMETER_VALUE from T_SYS_CONFIG_DEFAULT where PARAMETER_NAME = 'MOMENT_ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE') = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE_CODE AND {{TRANSACTION_LOCATION}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} {{OFFER_QUERY_GROUP_BY}} )

con:configuration.con:originalMessage:
{ "MarketingEventId": "974db8b9-111c-4883-8ca2-6bc663e4f4c7", "MarketingEventChannels": [ { "MarketingEventId": "974db8b9-111c-4883-8ca2-6bc663e4f4c7", "MarketingEventChannelId": "bce4fc4f-1b7d-2d49-b498-cea4e90a6105", "ChannelName": "No Channel", "ChannelCode": "NO_CHANNEL" } ], "EventName": "OFFER_NAME32042022073229032", "EventCode": "OFFER_CODE32042022073229032", "EventStatus": "DRAFT", "ProgramCode": "PP", "PackagedAudience": { "PackagedAudienceId": "7ae1f987-515e-4669-e053-5ca8e70ad3ee", "MarketingEventId": "974db8b9-111c-4883-8ca2-6bc663e4f4c7", "AudienceName": "All Members", "AudienceDescription": "All enrolled members with an active profile status", "HarmonyTemplate": { "type": "AND", "groupType": "GROUP", "conditions": [ { "type": "AND", "groupType": "GROUP", "conditions": [ { "type": "ATTRIBUTE", "attributeName": "PROGRAMCODE", "attributeId": "{{PROFILE_MASTER~PROGRAMCODE~ID}}", "operator": "EQ", "values": [ "{{PROGRAMCODE}}" ], "tableId": "PROFILE_MASTER", "caseSensitive": false }, { "type": "ATTRIBUTE", "attributeName": "ENROLLMENTSTATUS", "attributeId": "{{PROFILE_MASTER~ENROLLMENTSTATUS~ID}}", "operator": "EQ", "values": [ "A" ], "tableId": "PROFILE_MASTER", "caseSensitive": false } ] }, { "type": "ATTRIBUTE", "attributeName": "PROFILESTATUS", "attributeId": "{{PROFILE_MASTER~PROFILESTATUS~ID}}", "operator": "EQ", "values": [ "A" ], "tableId": "PROFILE_MASTER", "caseSensitive": false } ] }, "PackagedAudienceParams": [], "AudienceMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "PurchaseTxn.Enrollment.MemberStatus == \"A\"", "SurveyMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "ProfileSurveyResponse.Enrollment.MemberStatus == \"A\"" }, "AudienceSource": "PACKAGED_AUDIENCE", "PackagedOffer": { "PackagedOfferId": "a23bcbd3-92de-b45b-e053-5dedef0ad2b6", "MarketingEventId": "974db8b9-111c-4883-8ca2-6bc663e4f4c7", "PackagedOfferCode": "POINT_MULTIPLIER", "PackagedOfferName": "Point Multiplier", "PackagedOfferDescription": "Earn points for each dollar spent at a property", "MomentTemplate": "{
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"StartDate": "{{STARTDATE}}",
				"EndDate": "{{ENDDATE}}",
				"Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}",
				"MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY",
				"MomentStatus": "A",
				"MomentResponseValues": [
				{

				"MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY",
				"ResponsePropertyName": "BASE INDICATOR",
				"ResponsePropertyValue": "N",
				"Status": "P"
				},
				{
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY",
				"ResponsePropertyName": "ENGAGE INDICATOR",
				"ResponsePropertyValue": "Y",
				"Status": "P"
				},
				{
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY",
				"ResponsePropertyName": "POINT SUBTYPE",
				"ResponsePropertyValue": "{{DEFAULTPOINTSUBTYPEID}}",
				"Status": "P"
				},
				{
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY",
				"ResponsePropertyName": "POINT TYPE",
				"ResponsePropertyValue": "{{DEFAULTPOINTTYPEID}}",
				"Status": "P"
				}
				],"MomentEvent": {
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"EventType": "PurchaseTxn",
				"MomentQualifyingDateAttribute": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDateTime",
				"MomentOffers": [
				{
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"EventType": "PurchaseTxn",
				"OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}",
				"MomentOutcome": {
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"EventType": "PurchaseTxn",
				"OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"OutcomeEquationUi": "round({{POINTS_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}*PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible)",
				"CalculationTemplate": "round(<VariableFactor,[Number]>*<TransactionEligible,[Number]>)",
				"OutcomeEquationTemplate": "%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22func%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22Math.round%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22(%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22obj%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22VariableFactor%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22Number%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22var%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22variable_0%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22{{POINTS_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22*%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22obj%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22TransactionEligible%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22Number%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22var%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22variable_1%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%24PurchaseTxn.getTransactionEligible()%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22)%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22obj%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22round%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22A%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22drools%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22String.valueOf(new%20Double(Math.round({{POINTS_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}*%24PurchaseTxn.getTransactionEligible())))%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D",
				"FormulaName": "ROUND_ELIGIBLE",
				"Status": "A"
				},"MomentQualifyingRule": {
				"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"EventType": "PurchaseTxn",
				"OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
				"RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue >= 0 && PurchaseTxn.{{OPTIONALLOCATION}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.{{OPTIONALPRODUCT}} && PurchaseTxn.Nights >= {{MINIMUM_NIGHTS}}",
				"MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}]
				},
				"Status": "A"
				}
				]
				},
				"Status": "A",
				"BestOfferIndicator": false,
				"AdvancedModeIndicator": false,
				"IsTestUser": false,
				"ReleaseState": "P"
				}", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT profile_id) AS unique_customers,
 SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers,
 SUM(eligible_revenue) AS total_points,
 ceil(SUM(profile_trans) /{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
 ceil(SUM(eligible_revenue) /{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
 ceil((SUM(profile_trans) /{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
 ceil((SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
 FROM ( {{OFFERS_QUERY}}
 FROM T_ACT_TRANSACTION
 INNER JOIN T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL
 ON T_ACT_TRANSACTION.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID
 INNER JOIN V_TRANSACTION
 ON V_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ID = T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ID {{PRODUCTSUBQUERY}} {{LOCATIONSUBQUERY}}
 WHERE T_ACT_TRANSACTION.PROGRAM_CODE = :ProgramCode
 AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.STATUS IN('A','P')
 AND(T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('PR', 'EP')
 OR(T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('RT', 'ER', 'EX')
 AND ACT_TRANSACTION_XREF_ID IS NULL))
 AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE
 AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_DATE < :SIMULATION_END_DATE
 AND V_TRANSACTION.NIGHTS >={{MINIMUM_NIGHTS}}
 AND {{PRODUCT_HIERARCHY}} AND (SELECT PARAMETER_VALUE from T_SYS_CONFIG_DEFAULT where PARAMETER_NAME = 'MOMENT_ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE') = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE_CODE
 AND {{TRANSACTION_LOCATION}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} {{OFFER_QUERY_GROUP_BY}} )", "OfferMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "PurchaseTxn.Offers.OfferCode == \"{{OFFERCODEOFFERNAME}}\"", "PackagedOfferParams": [ { "MarketingEventId": "974db8b9-111c-4883-8ca2-6bc663e4f4c7", "PackagedOfferParamId": "a23bcbd3-94de-b45b-e053-5dedef0ad2b6", "PackagedOfferId": "a23bcbd3-92de-b45b-e053-5dedef0ad2b6", "ParamName": SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY PROFILE_ID )

} ", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(
SELECT profile_id,
{{OFFERS_QUERY}}
FROM t_act_transaction
WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null
AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}}
{{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
GROUP BY PROFILE_ID

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion for HTTP status code
Smart Assertion for HTTP status code
